item.title: Tutorial:Regression from Scratch and Simple
item.author: alvaroaguado3@gmail.com (Alvaro Aguado)
item.description: Question: I’m not a math expert. But I want to understand least squares completely. Can you please explain how to do Least Squares Regression from Scratch? Preface Regression is at the core of Machine Learning. Almost all the literature in predictive modelling, time series forecasting, and Artificial Intelligence, relies on the basic principles of linear regression. Nowadays everyone can compute linear regression using statistical software or even Excel, but how many people really know what’s going on behind the scenes.
